About Me

My name is Miguel Ángel and I consider myself a multipotential person

Passionate web developer with an innovative approach to creating and enhancing digital businesses. Front-end technology expert, turning ideas into code to propel projects to new horizons.

Projects

migueldeveloper.es

This is my final thesis, a research project where I achieved a score of 9/10 by showcasing several key features. These include real-time querying of cryptocurrency prices through an API, establishing a connection with a digital wallet for "web3 login," accessing concealed information post-wallet connection, executing cryptocurrency transactions, and tracking transactions on the blockchain.

makelenller.com

Just as Da Vinci excelled in mathematics and logic, he was also a master in the arts. I aspire to follow in his footsteps, dedicating over 15 years of my life to nurturing my artistic-musical side. Competing at the national level in Spain and performing in numerous concerts, I seek to cultivate my skills and creative expression, inspired by the example of one of history's great geniuses. You can explore my artistic journey further on my website.
